What did you do last week?

Last week, I continued to build the foundation for my personal website, working with HTML and CSS to style the project update pages. I focused on making the site more visually appealing and functional, which provided a good framework to expand on in future updates.

What do you plan to do this week?

This week, I found a promising website template that aligns well with the design I envisioned. My main goal will be to start porting my content and existing structure over to this template. I hope that using a template will streamline the process, allowing me to implement more features to the site rather than starting from scratch. Furthermore, I intend on finalizing my implementation of my kmeans analysis.

Are there any impediments in your way?

Time management remains a challenge as I balance this project with my other classes. However, the template should help accelerate development and keep me on track even with my busy schedule.

Reflection on the process you used last week, how can you make the process work better?

Using a template going forward should improve the process by saving time on design, allowing me to focus more on content and functionality. Additionally, setting aside a dedicated block of time each week specifically for this project will help ensure consistent progress amidst other obligations.
